name: P600fw
tagline: Teensy++ based Sequential Circuits Prophet 600 firmware remake
body:
https://github.com/gligli/p600fw (Project page)

http://forum.anafrog.com/phpBB/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=10535 (French forum)

## Description

This is the P600FW project, a CPU/firmware remake for the SCI Prophet 600 (http://www.vintagesynth.com/sci/p600.php).
It uses a slightly modified Teensy++ board (http://www.pjrc.com/store/teensypp_pins.html) that plugs into the Z80 socket.

## Installation and usage

See documentation PDFs...

## History

* Alpha 20130226 : First public version.
* Beta 1.0 : First proper release.

## Downloads

* Beta 1.0 :
	* Full archive :
		http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_beta_1_0.zip
	* English documentation (main version, by Bulghur) :
		http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/Prophet600FirmwareUpgrade_en_beta_1_0.pdf
	* French documentation (WIP translation by GliGli) :
		http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/Prophet600FirmwareUpgrade_fr_beta_1_0.pdf
	* Japanese documentation (translated by Tohk) :
		http://www.d1.dion.ne.jp/~ohk/p600/Prophet600FirmwareUpgrade_ja_beta_1_0.pdf

## Demos

* Filter overdrive:
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_overdrive_2squares.flac	
* Envelopes (attack time has improved since):
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_envelopes_reso_zaps.flac	
* Polyphonic resonance / unison:
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_poly_pads_unison.flac
* Polyphonic percussive sounds with release:
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_poly_percussive.flac
* LFO:
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_hell_fo.flac
* Polymod (formants):
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_pmod_voices.flac
* Polymod (percussive sounds):
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_pmod_indus.flac
* MIDI (velocity sensitivity):
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_midi_velocity.flac
* Arpeggiator:
	http://sfx.gligli.free.fr/zik/p600/p600fw_arpeggiator.flac
	
## Future improvements/fixes (aka. TODO list)

* Assigner rework (better priority system; unison track latch; disabling voices).
* Midi out / sysex patch dumps.
* User interface (probably moving all the membrane keypad options to something like: hit a button / turn the "Speed" data pot).
* Unison detune.
* Second LFO (probably just a simple vibrato).
* Sequencer (probably inspired by the Six-trak one, without being multitimbral, of course).
* Synchronizing LFO/Arpeggiator/Sequencer to MIDI clock.
* Various bugfixes and tweaks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
